name: Moitiom
description:
This game is incomplete and rather simple.

The initial idea was that different kinds of insects would fly across the screen and you would earn money by catching different types according to a goal presented by the game. These goals would be things like: catch only asymmetrical butterflies, catch only ladybugs, etc.

I ran out of time once again, and the finished product only lets you drag the insects around the screen. There's no scoring system in place yet. I had a lot of fun making this game and learned many new things about Godot, but the game is not particularly fun to play at this time. I am planning to add more features to it at some point in the future.
